anya-e0105n17:1_0: Punapi rājā dakkhiṇārāmavāsimhi jimhamānase kuhakatissatthere pasanno hutvā tassatthāya
anya-e0105n17:1_2: bhikkhū taṁ nivāretuṁ asakkontā punapi tato apakkamiṁsu. Tadāpi mahāvihāro nava māsāni
anya-e0105n17:1_3: bhikkhūhi suñño ahosi. Rājā pana attano ajjhāsayavaseneva tattha jetavanavihāraṁ
anya-e0105n17:1_4: kāretvā tassa kuhakatissattherassa adāsiyeva. Tattha dakkhiṇagirivihārato sāgaliyā
anya-e0105n17:1_5: bhikkhū āgantvā vasiṁsu. Pacchā ca te ambasāmaṇerasilākālarañño kāle (1067-1080-bu-va)
anya-e0105n17:2_2: jetavanavāsino (829-845-bu-va) cāti tayo nikāyā uppannā ahesuṁ. Tesu pana abhayagirivāsinoyeva
anya-e0105n17:2_3: visesato pākaṭā ceva honti balavanto ca. Tathā hi te visuddhattheravādapiṭakañca
anya-e0105n17:2_5: sampaṭicchanti. Tesu dhammarucinikāyapiṭakassa sampaṭicchitabhāvo pākaṭoyeva. Mahisāsakādinikāyapiṭakassa
anya-e0105n17:2_7: ceva aṭṭhakathāsu paṭikkhittavaṇṇapiṭakādināmavasena ca veditabbo, tathā mahāyānapiṭakassa
